item.title: 【Documentaries】WEB-DL - Michael Jackson: Thriller 40 (Documentary) 1080p WEB-DL
item.description:
​
Michael Jackson: Thriller 40 is a 2023 documentary film directed by Nelson George celebrating the 40th anniversary of Thriller. The film was released in the United States on December 2, 2023. It aired on Showtime and was streamed on Paramount+ only for Showtime subscribers. Internationally, it debuted the same day in the U.K., Australia, Canada, Italy, France, Germany, Switzerland, Austria, Latin America, and South Korea.On October 27, 2023, the trailer for the documentary was released.

Format : MPEG-TS
File size : 1.81 GiB
Duration : 1 h 28 min
Width : 1920 pixels
Height : 1080 pixels
Display aspect ratio : 16:9
Frame rate : 46.875 FPS (1024 SPF)
